data.name: Responding to the needs of your customers in the current crisis mode
data.summary:
Discussion on :

-Understanding the changing landscape of customer needs.
-Which Industries present opportunities now ?
-Which Industries are going to be challenging ?
-How to attract customers now ?
-How do we get customers to pay ?
data.speakers:
Esteemed Panelists:

- Saurabh Garg , Co-Founder & CBO , NoBroker.com
- Lalit Keshre , Co-Founder & CEO, Groww
- Nityanand Sharma , Co-Founder & CEO, Simpl
- Meghna Suryakumar , Co-Founder & CEO, Crediwatch
